messages.subject: Need advice about setting up a local unschooling list.
messages.msgSnippet: I m in the process of setting up a state unschooling yahoo list for Louisiana and wonder if anyone here could help me out?  I ve got the list set up, but now
messages.messageBody:
I'm in the process of setting up a state unschooling yahoo list for Louisiana
and wonder if anyone here could help me out? I've got the list set up, but
now wanted to add some links. I'm not sure if it's legal to just add people's
articles or links, or if you need to get permission from each person?? I've
looked at other unschooling lists and would like to use some of the links they
have, but is that kosher (like this one, for instance..I really like the links
here...can I copy them??).

I'm hoping that this will eventually be a great way for all of the scattered
unschoolers here make some connections.

Thanks,
Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
